verses.verse: Now when Rachel <S%H7354><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> children, she became <S%H7065><s%> jealous <S%H7065><s%> of her sister; <S%H269><s%> and she said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> me children, <S%H1121><s%> or else <S%H518><s%> <S%H369><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>"

Then Jacob's anger <S%H639><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Am I in the place <S%H8478><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has withheld <S%H4513><s%> from you the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb <S%H990><s%>?"

And she said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> is my maid <S%H519><s%> Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> go <S%H935><s%> in to her, that she may bear <S%H3205><s%> on my knees, <S%H1290><s%> that through <S%H4480><s%> her I too <S%H1571><s%> may have <S%H1129><s%> children. <S%H1129><s%>"
So she gave <S%H5414><s%> him her maid <S%H8198><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> as a wife, <S%H802><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in to her.
And Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>

Then Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has vindicated <S%H1777><s%> me, and has indeed <S%H1571><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and has given <S%H5414><s%> me a son. <S%H1121><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Dan. <S%H1835><s%>
And Rachel's maid <S%H8198><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

So Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "With mighty <S%H430><s%> wrestlings <S%H5319><s%> I have wrestled <S%H6617><s%> with my sister, <S%H269><s%> [and] I have indeed <S%H1571><s%> prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>" And she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

When Leah <S%H3812><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had stopped <S%H5975><s%> bearing, <S%H3205><s%> she took <S%H3947><s%> her maid <S%H8198><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> as a wife. <S%H802><s%>
And Leah's maid <S%H8198><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>
Then Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "How fortunate! <S%H1409><s%>" So she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Gad. <S%H1410><s%>
And Leah's maid <S%H8198><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

Then Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Happy <S%H837><s%> am I! For women <S%H1323><s%> will call <S%H7121><s%> me happy. <S%H833><s%>" So she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Asher. <S%H836><s%>

Now in the days <S%H3117><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%> Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to his mother <S%H517><s%> Leah. <S%H3812><s%> Then Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Leah, <S%H3812><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me some <S%H4480><s%> of your son's mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>"

But she said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Is it a small <S%H4592><s%> matter <S%H4592><s%> for you to take <S%H3947><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%>? And would you take <S%H3947><s%> my son's mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>?" So Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Therefore <S%H3651><s%> he may lie <S%H7901><s%> with you tonight <S%H3915><s%> in return <S%H8478><s%> for your son's mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>"

When Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in from the field <S%H7704><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> then Leah <S%H3812><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "You must come <S%H935><s%> in to me, for I have surely <S%H7936><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> you with my son's mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>" So he lay <S%H7901><s%> with her that night. <S%H3915><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H8085><s%> to Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

Then Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me my wages, <S%H7939><s%> because <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> my maid <S%H8198><s%> to my husband. <S%H376><s%>" So she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Issachar. <S%H3485><s%>
And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Then Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has endowed <S%H2064><s%> me with a good <S%H2896><s%> gift; <S%H2065><s%> now <S%H6471><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will dwell <S%H2082><s%> with me, because <S%H3588><s%> I have borne <S%H3205><s%> him six <S%H8337><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>" So she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
And afterward <S%H310><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> a daughter <S%H1323><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> her Dinah. <S%H1783><s%>
Then God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H8085><s%> to her and opened <S%H6605><s%> her womb. <S%H7358><s%>
So she conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has taken <S%H622><s%> away <S%H622><s%> my reproach. <S%H2781><s%>"
And she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> give <S%H3254><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>"

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had borne <S%H3205><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "Send <S%H7971><s%> me away, <S%H7971><s%> that I may go <S%H1980><s%> to my own place <S%H4725><s%> and to my own country. <S%H776><s%>

"Give <S%H5414><s%> [me] my wives <S%H802><s%> and my children <S%H3206><s%> for whom <S%H834><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> you, and let me depart; <S%H1980><s%> for you yourself <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> my service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have rendered <S%H5647><s%> you."

But Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> it pleases <S%H4672><s%> <S%H2580><s%> you, [stay with me;] I have divined <S%H5172><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> me on your account. <S%H1558><s%>"
And he continued, <S%H559><s%> "Name <S%H9344><s%> me your wages, <S%H7939><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it."

But he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You yourself <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> how <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> you and how <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> your cattle <S%H4735><s%> have fared <S%H1961><s%> with me.

"For you had <S%H1961><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> I came, and it has increased <S%H6555><s%> to a multitude; <S%H7230><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you wherever I turned. <S%H7272><s%> But now, <S%H6258><s%> when <S%H4970><s%> shall I provide <S%H6213><s%> for my own household <S%H1004><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>?"

So he said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> shall I give <S%H5414><s%> you?" And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not give <S%H5414><s%> me anything. <S%H3972><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> [one] thing <S%H1697><s%> for me, I will again <S%H7725><s%> pasture <S%H7462><s%> [and] keep <S%H8104><s%> your flock: <S%H6629><s%>

let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your entire <S%H3605><s%> flock <S%H6629><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> removing <S%H5493><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> black <S%H2345><s%> one <S%H7716><s%> among the lambs, <S%H3775><s%> and the spotted <S%H2921><s%> and speckled <S%H5348><s%> among the goats; <S%H5795><s%> and [such] shall be my wages. <S%H7939><s%>

"So my honesty <S%H6666><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> for me later, <S%H4279><s%> <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> my wages. <S%H7939><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> that is not speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> among the goats <S%H5795><s%> and black <S%H2345><s%> among the lambs, <S%H3775><s%> [if found] with me, will be considered stolen. <S%H1589><s%>"
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Good, <S%H2005><s%> let it be according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>"

So he removed <S%H5493><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> the striped <S%H6124><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> male <S%H8495><s%> goats <S%H8495><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> female <S%H5795><s%> goats, <S%H5795><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> with white <S%H3836><s%> in it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the black <S%H2345><s%> ones <S%H2345><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the care <S%H3027><s%> of his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> [a distance of] three <S%H7969><s%> days' journey <S%H1870><s%> between <S%H996><s%> himself and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of Laban's flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> fresh <S%H3892><s%> rods <S%H4731><s%> of poplar <S%H3839><s%> and almond <S%H3869><s%> and plane <S%H6196><s%> trees, <S%H6196><s%> and peeled <S%H6478><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> stripes <S%H6479><s%> in them, exposing <S%H4286><s%> the white <S%H3836><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] in the rods. <S%H4731><s%>

And he set <S%H3322><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had peeled <S%H6478><s%> in front <S%H5227><s%> of the flocks <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters, <S%H7298><s%> [even] in the watering <S%H4325><s%> troughs, <S%H8268><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to drink; <S%H8354><s%> and they mated <S%H2552><s%> when they came <S%H935><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

So the flocks <S%H6629><s%> mated <S%H2552><s%> by the rods, <S%H4731><s%> and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> brought <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> striped, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and spotted. <S%H2921><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> separated <S%H6504><s%> the lambs, <S%H3775><s%> and made <S%H5414><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the striped <S%H6124><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the black <S%H2345><s%> in the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban; <S%H3837><s%> and he put <S%H7896><s%> his own herds <S%H5739><s%> apart, <S%H905><s%> and did not put <S%H7896><s%> them with Laban's flock. <S%H6629><s%>

Moreover, it came <S%H1961><s%> about whenever <S%H3605><s%> the stronger <S%H7194><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> were mating, <S%H3179><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> would place <S%H7760><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters, <S%H7298><s%> so that they might mate <S%H3179><s%> by the rods; <S%H4731><s%>
but when the flock <S%H6629><s%> was feeble, <S%H5848><s%> he did not put <S%H7760><s%> [them] in; so the feebler <S%H5848><s%> were Laban's and the stronger <S%H7194><s%> Jacob's.

So the man <S%H376><s%> became <S%H6555><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> prosperous, <S%H6555><s%> and had <S%H1961><s%> large <S%H7227><s%> flocks <S%H6629><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> and male <S%H5650><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> <S%H8198><s%> and camels <S%H1581><s%> and donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>
